common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define:
For CB orders that fulfilled by 3PF, support 3PF Warehouse Vendors to update the tpf_tracking_status when 3PF warehouse receive the order and complete the outbound of the package.
CB orders that fulfilled by 3PFï¼š
v2.shop.get_shop_info  - shop_fulfillment_flag in {Pure - 3PF Shop,PFF - 3PF Shop,LFF Hybrid Shop}
And
v2.order.get_order_detail -  fulfillment_flag = fulfilled_by_local_seller

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The name of 3PF Warehouse Vendor. Prohibit pure numbers and excessive abbreviations. Standardize naming for easy business recognition. Input priority: warehouse English name > full pinyin of warehouse brand name > warehouse Chinese name > other officially recognized and prominent names.



","name":"tpf_name","sample":"Shopee 3PF","type":"string","required":"True","key":"KsNAiQj"},{"description":"

The 3PF tracking status for the timestamp. All statuses are in lower case. 

List of status: 

- 3pf_warehouse_order_created

- 3pf_warehouse_outbound_done

","name":"tpf_tracking_status","sample":"3pf_warehouse_outbound_done","type":"string","required":"True","key":"JCKCzAd"},{"description":"","name":"package_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"True","key":"mSHzxbW","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"2003160SXK2A3T","type":"string","required":"True","key":"fNcxNzk"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

","name":"package_number","sample":"OFG38027870177402","type":"string","required":"False","key":"CbxnzcS"},{"description":"

This is to indicate timestamp of the 3PF tracking status.

Timestamp should be within order create time and order pick up by 3PL time.

","name":"update_time","sample":"1610000000","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"fBtEkEt"}]}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"tGwSPMb"},{"description":"

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fdWKWiB"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"e3e3e7f32b90e1a2b73dc8ca69586501","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JKkCHji"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"YbCYKCW","children":[{"description":"

Update success order list.

","name":"success_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"dJBixzH","children":[{"description":"

","name":"package_number","sample":"OFG38027870177402","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KpHEzKd"}]},{"description":"

Update fail order list.
